author: Steve B
comment: Excellent app. Use it all the time for checking sunset/sunrise times. As a personal preference I would like see the compass motion exhibit apparent mass/momentum so it behaves more like a real compass as it rotates.

I really loved it for about a week and then it stopped working. Reinstalled it twice with no luck. Possible conflict with samsungs latest security update. Very frustrating because it seems to be a really good app.

author: E Beaulieu
comment: Works great . For the folks that it doesn't work for, your phone may not have a MAGNETIC SENSOR. One thing I'd like to see is display of  MAGNETIC to TRUE NORTH.

author: Ness Bashara
comment: BEST COMPASS EVER THANKS! I have been looking for a decent compass for my cell phone for 19 years! This IS THE ONLY ONE I WILL NOW USE. IT SEEMS to work FLAWLESSLY! Yes, I've had a cellular phone since 1989.

Initially showed North accurately and speedily, after the usual figure of eight business. After accessing the colour settings it decided that the road North past my house was now heading West. Would not be persuaded otherwise in spite of repeated figure of eights.

author: Robert Emmons
comment: I had to calibrate it a few times before the compass would reflect the correct heading, but now it's on and very accurate. Let's see what happens in the long term. But so far so good!  Edit; Question, does this compass automatically set itself for magnetic declination?

reply.author: SimplyWerx
reply.content: Yes. If the compass is in True Heading mode, and location detected, the compass will correct for magnetic declination.

author: Charles Docker
comment: Further to my previous post. I used it last night for a 10 mile night hike with a group of SCOUTS. Worked perfectly and got us out a few sticky (muddy) situations. Get it. No doubts.

author: Gary Ellis
comment: WOW!  This one is easy to calibrate (no more endless figure 8's each time you use the app) and it gives you so much more, such as your current geographical position in latitude/longitude measure, sunrise and -set, moonrise and -set as well as sun and moon declination (just in case you want to take a celestial navigation fix using the traditional navigational equipment).  I am most pleased with this excellent app.  BRAVO!

author: Steve Glidden
comment: This is the first compass I've found that works correctly. FIRST TIME EVERY TIME! Thanks for making an app that runs flawlessly EVERY TIME! Easy to read and extremely accurate!

author: David Gilberts
comment: Simply won't work.   it worked once, now worthless.

author: Tim Hieb
comment: I read that the Google phone, Nexus 5 would not allow this app to work properly, however it has performed flawlessly.  For those whose phone it doesn't work on.....get a new phone.

author: Sasha Shame
comment: Speaking as a full time Lyft driver and an Eagle Scout, this is the *BEST* app compass that I have ever used! It would be nice to have a camera feature so that it could be used over a topographical/analogue map, but it still rocks my socks either way,and actually works in split screen mode with Waze!

author: Douglas Beattie
comment: Works great but it always asks to do the figure 8. But once I do it it works very well. So for it being free I love it.

author: Craig Kallmayer
comment: Doesn't work at all.  Calibrated until the cows came home.  Compass never rotates......ever.

author: Phil Sapp
comment: This compass app is the easiest and simplest compass I believe I've ever used. It's extremely accurate and a benefit that I really enjoy is the sun and moon icon placed upon the dial to show its location at that particular hour. Another wonderful benefit is that this app is worthy of payment but it's free. :-)

author: Doug Nelson
comment: The damn thing works better than my gyro Compass the first thing I do when I climb in the aircraft I take my phone out at turn on the phone app for the compass put my phone in the phone mount on the panel and away we go it's a hell of a compass please keep up the good work thank you very much Doug Nelson

Now that I have a phone with lots of memory, I can just download all the applicable apps and give them a real time comparison. Nothing was even close to this. You need a compass for your phone? This app is awesome, look no further.

author: re za
comment: Shows langitude and langitude😐  but unfortunately Desnt show altitude. Please fix this defect. 😞

author: Steve Seftel
comment: It's good, works very well. But I would like to see sun and moon indications for other side of horizons also. If you added your elevation, this would really make it stand out and be 5 star. I will look for other apps by this dev. Thanks.

author: Joseph Aho
comment: im facing north and it will say north but when i turn 90 degrees to the left i dont get west.. then i turn back to north and then i get west... what wrong here help anyone ?

author: Rishiraj Singh Sikarwar
comment: I am very glad from this app because it has also sun and Moon information  when it will rise or when it will set love I'd it is also add free and have up and down view also very good work good luck to team to make more interesting app

author: sasy ron
comment: Very good.  Please add direction to saved places, by pointed/selected from map (Google Map for example)

author: Joseph Foster
comment: dont work did so many figure 8s my wrist hurt lol

author: Roger RamJet
comment: This app is really awesome.   The graphically stunning.   The colors pop, and fully customisable.   And as an added bonus it is accurate.   This app is not your little brother's toy, this app is genuine tool grade .  Enjoy it & have fun, you just might impress someone.

author: Albert Bianchi
comment: Best one I've used, have to calibrate bit every time I turn the phone on.. EASY

author: Edison Franklin
comment: Very precise and dependable compass. I use it to locate the Qiblih, it's very good for that. God bless

author: Perry Metcalf
comment: P.M. Rasy set up no adverts good looking app what more can you ask for.

author: Huck Chandler
comment: I love the precision , fluidity and perfect graphics,.. I would love,,love,,love to see a version or update that removes the bottom dome, and replaces it with,. the solar and lunar position on the opposite side of the globe... :)

author: Des Silverson
comment: Compass is 180 degrees out. Bearings alter by up to 30 when returning to the same position. Dangerous application.

author: Bill Webber
comment: Very nice!  Only thing I'd recommended is to have the option to view the direction as a bearing instead of an azimuth.

author: JE C
comment: I've tried most compass apps and finally settled with this one. Really great app

author: larry denholm
comment: This app seems to work well having tested it against the real thing.

author: Mark D
comment: Great app and excellent UX & UI. Easy to use and read under any lighting conditions. Compass is very precise and better than carrying and using an analog compass.
Its awesome, and i like  the fact that you can change the face colors really cool, i will always keep it never know when you get lost..

author: PabloGamer530
comment: Super good aplication. Is simple but beautiful. Nice 3D model. And THANKS to do a nice app without ads nor in-app purchases. Love it!
Excellent App...No more words for it..the best part is Ad-Free!

author: Deborah Lane
comment: I'm bad with directions with driving. This helped a lot.

author: Steven Webber
comment: Seems to measure pretty close to GPS error. At one location claiming to be at the equator I measured a latitude of .00006 degrees.

author: Robert Wolfe
comment: Best compass I have found. Simple, elegant, accurate.

author: valentine sitsha
comment: The best ever compass I've ever trusted. Works great and am enjoying. Could have given it 6 out of 5 stars
